content: Once you're able to take stock of your new surroundings, you'll find yourself on the outskirts of a village under cover of night. Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Once you're able to take stock of your new surroundings, you'll find yourself on the outskirts of a village under cover of night. Before heading onward, you may want to backtrack up the hill you were carried down, as you'll find a free green Wisp to absorb in the shack at the top, plus a Monkey-Head Mushroom to harvest.
